general.name: mos_target_supercosmos
general.description: Contains merged sources for every field in the SuperCOSMOS Science Archive (SSA).

surveys.name: BHM
surveys.description: An optical time-domain spectroscopic survey of quasars and X-ray sources

surveys.name: MWM
surveys.description: A time-domain, optical+IR spectroscopic survey of Milky Way stars of all types.

general.naming_convention: $MOS_TARGET/[V_TARG]/mos_supercosmos-[NUM].fits, where V_TARG=1.0.1 for DR18; and NUM = 1..1 to partition the file into parts

changelog.description: Describes changes to the datamodel product and/or file structure from one release to another

objidb.name: OBJIDB
objidb.description: objID for B band detection merged into this object

objidr1.name: OBJIDR1
objidr1.description: objID for R1 band detection merged into this object

objidr2.name: OBJIDR2
objidr2.description: objID for R2 band detection merged into this object

objidi.name: OBJIDI
objidi.description: objID for I band detection merged into this object

epoch.name: EPOCH
epoch.description: Epoch of position (variance weighted mean epoch of available measures)

ra.name: RA
ra.description: Mean RA, computed from detections merged in this catalogue

dec.name: DEC
dec.description: Mean Dec, computed from detections merged in this catalogue

sigra.name: SIGRA
sigra.description: Uncertainty in RA (formal random error not inc. systematic errors)

sigdec.name: SIGDEC
sigdec.description: Uncertainty in Dec (formal random error not inc. systematic errors)

cx.name: CX
cx.description: Cartesian x of unit (ra,dec) vector on celestial sphere

cy.name: CY
cy.description: Cartesian y of unit (ra,dec) vector on celestial sphere

cz.name: CZ
cz.description: Cartesian z of unit (ra,dec) vector on celestial sphere

sigmuacosd.name: SIGMUACOSD
sigmuacosd.description: Error on proper motion in RA direction

sigmud.name: SIGMUD
sigmud.description: Error on proper motion in Dec direction

chi2.name: CHI2
chi2.description: Chi-squared value of proper motion solution

nplates.name: NPLATES
nplates.description: No. of plates used for this proper motion measurement

classmagb.name: CLASSMAGB
classmagb.description: B band magnitude selected by B image class

classmagr1.name: CLASSMAGR1
classmagr1.description: R1 band magnitude selected by R1 image class

classmagr2.name: CLASSMAGR2
classmagr2.description: R2 band magnitude selected by R2 image class

classmagi.name: CLASSMAGI
classmagi.description: I band magnitude selected by I image class

gcormagb.name: GCORMAGB
gcormagb.description: B band magnitude assuming object is galaxy

gcormagr1.name: GCORMAGR1
gcormagr1.description: R1 band magnitude assuming object is galaxy

gcormagr2.name: GCORMAGR2
gcormagr2.description: R2 band magnitude assuming object is galaxy

gcormagi.name: GCORMAGI
gcormagi.description: I band magnitude assuming object is galaxy

scormagb.name: SCORMAGB
scormagb.description: B band magnitude assuming object is star

scormagr1.name: SCORMAGR1
scormagr1.description: R1 band magnitude assuming object is star

scormagr2.name: SCORMAGR2
scormagr2.description: R2 band magnitude assuming object is star

scormagi.name: SCORMAGI
scormagi.description: I band magnitude assuming object is star

meanclass.name: MEANCLASS
meanclass.description: Estimate of image class based on unit-weighted mean of individual classes

classb.name: CLASSB
classb.description: Image classification from B band detection

classr1.name: CLASSR1
classr1.description: Image classification from R1 band detection

classr2.name: CLASSR2
classr2.description: Image classification from R2 band detection

classi.name: CLASSI
classi.description: Image classification from I band detection

qualb.name: QUALB
qualb.description: Bitwise quality flag from B band detection

qualr1.name: QUALR1
qualr1.description: Bitwise quality flag from R1 band detection

qualr2.name: QUALR2
qualr2.description: Bitwise quality flag from R2 band detection

quali.name: QUALI
quali.description: Bitwise quality flag from I band detection

blendb.name: BLENDB
blendb.description: Blend flag from B band detection

blendr1.name: BLENDR1
blendr1.description: Blend flag from R1 band detection

blendr2.name: BLENDR2
blendr2.description: Blend flag from R2 band detection

blendi.name: BLENDI
blendi.description: Blend flag from I band detection

prfstatb.name: PRFSTATB
prfstatb.description: Profile statistic from B band detection

prfstatr1.name: PRFSTATR1
prfstatr1.description: Profile statistic from R1 band detection

prfstatr2.name: PRFSTATR2
prfstatr2.description: Profile statistic from R2 band detection

prfstati.name: PRFSTATI
prfstati.description: Profile statistic from I band detection

l.name: L
l.description: The Galactic longitude of the source

b.name: B
b.description: The Galactic latitude of the source

d.name: D
d.description: The great-circle distance of the source from the Galactic centre

ebmv.name: EBMV
ebmv.description: The estimated foreground reddening at this position from Schlegel et al. (1998)
